description: ORDER ON PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS, it is ORDERED that the claims for habeas corpus relief asserted in Smith's Section 2254 52 amended petition are DENIED. It is FURTHER ORDERED that a Certificate of Appealability (COA) not be issued to Petitioner Smith. A COA is hereby DENIED as to all issues. Signed by Judge Callie V. S. Granade on 9/30/2013. (mab) (Entered: 09/30/2013)
